definition: The term "Tierwelt" refers to the collective existence of various living creatures inhabiting the Earth. It commonly denotes the entire animal kingdom, encompassing a wide range of species, both domestic and wild. This word is frequently used in scientific, educational, and environmental contexts to discuss the diversity, behavior, and interrelationships of animals within their respective ecosystems.

examples.german: Die Tierwelt im Zoo ist sehr vielf√§ltig.
examples.english: The animal world in the zoo is very diverse.

examples.german: Die Tierwelt des Regenwaldes ist bedroht.
examples.english: The animal world of the rainforest is endangered.

examples.german: Die Tierwelt in Afrika ist beeindruckend.
examples.english: The animal world in Africa is impressive.

examples.german: Die Tierwelt der Ozeane ist faszinierend.
examples.english: The animal world of the oceans is fascinating.

examples.german: Die Tierwelt in den Alpen ist einzigartig.
examples.english: The animal world in the Alps is unique.
